  • BulkAssignRoutingInput

BulkAssignRoutingInput

Input for bulk device routing assignment.

input BulkAssignRoutingInput {
  routerID: ID!
  assignments: [SingleDeviceRoutingInput!]!
}

Fields​

BulkAssignRoutingInput.routerID ● ID! non-null scalar​

Router ID

BulkAssignRoutingInput.assignments ● [SingleDeviceRoutingInput!]! non-null input​

List of device routing assignments

Member Of​

bulkAssignRouting mutation

Previous
BulkAddressInput
Next
ChainHopInput
